Introduction
This topic contains information on developing claims for service connection (SC) for PTSD or other conditions based on personal trauma, including
general information on personal trauma
developing claims of SC based on in-service personal trauma
assigning claim attributes to claims based onÂ personal trauma
MST claim processing requirements
action to take when the Veteran alleges MST or other personal trauma but does not claim a disability
, and
soliciting or clarifying consent for automatic notifications to the Veterans Health Administration (VHA) in claims based on MST
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B - Development for Posttraumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD) or Other Claims Related to Personal Trauma
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section B
